data.title: The Conjugal Bed
data.meta_description: The Conjugal Bed Fri. Dec 21, 2018 at 6:30pm EST    The Conjugal Bed   1963. Italy/France. Directed by Marco Ferreri. A satirical Buñuelian grotesquerie t
data.text: 1963. Italy/France. Directed by Marco Ferreri. A satirical Buñuelian grotesquerie that was cruelly censored, Ferreri’s first Italian feature involves the grim fate of a doting, middle-aged husband (Tognazzi) who struggles to get over his neurotic impotence and his fierce wife’s impatience, only to be devoured like a male praying mantis. DCP from Luce Cinecittà; courtesy Rialto. In Italian; English subtitles. 90 min.
